41 namespace bitpit {
42 
43 class Vertex {
44 
45 friend class PatchKernel;
46 
47 friend bitpit::OBinaryStream& (::operator<<) (bitpit::OBinaryStream&, const Vertex &);
48 friend bitpit::IBinaryStream& (::operator>>) (bitpit::IBinaryStream&, Vertex &);
49 
50 public:
51  enum Coordinate {
52  COORD_X =0,
53  COORD_Y,
54  COORD_Z,
55  };
56 
57  Vertex();
58  Vertex(long id, bool interior = true);
59  Vertex(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &coords, bool interior = true);
60 
61  Vertex(const Vertex &other) = default;
62  Vertex(Vertex &&other) = default;
63  Vertex& operator = (const Vertex &other) = default;
64  Vertex& operator=(Vertex &&other) = default;
65 
66  void swap(Vertex &other) noexcept;
67 
68  void initialize(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &coords, bool interior);
69 
70  bool isInterior() const;
71 
72  bool operator==(const Vertex &other) const;
73 
74  double & operator[](int coord_id);
75  double operator[](int coord_id) const;
76 
77  void setId(long id);
78  long getId() const;
79 
80  void setCoords(const std::array<double, 3> &coords);
81  const std::array<double, 3> & getCoords() const;
82 
83  void translate(const std::array<double, 3> &translation);
84  void translate(double sx, double sy, double sz);
85  void scale(const std::array<double, 3> &scaling, const std::array<double, 3> &center);
86  void scale(double sx, double sy, double sz, double cx, double cy, double cz);
87 
88  static const long NULL_ID;
89 
90  unsigned int getBinarySize() const;
91 
92  void display(std::ostream &out, unsigned short int indent) const;
93 
94 protected:
95  void setInterior(bool interior);
96 
97 private:
98  std::array<double, 3> m_coords;
99  long m_id;
100  bool m_interior;
101 
102  void _initialize(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &coords, bool interior);
103 
104 };
